ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Double Star 1 Spacecraft Spatio-Temporal Analyzer of Field Fluctuations and Digital Wave Processor (STAFF-DWP) Prime Parameters Data
ResourceHeader.Description: The Double Star 1 Spatio-Temporal Analyzer of Field Fluctuations and Digital Wave Processor prime parameter data set contains various parameters at spin resolution. These parameters include universal time, the instrument status, and magnetic field spectral power from FGM data for various frequency ranges. Frequency ranges not clear. These parameters are available through Double Star Science Data Centre The Data Ring with restricted access.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Prof. C. Carr, Dr. Tielong Zhang, European Space Agency/International

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Double Star 1 STAFF-DWP Prime Parameters Data

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: '01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000'

Parameter.Name: Double Star 1 STAFF-DWP Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time in data cell: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: '01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000'. The time is an interval centered time tag rounded to nearest msecond.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 1 STAFF-DWP Magnetic Field Power using FGM data
Parameter.Description: Double Star 1 STAFF-DWP Magnetic field power. Frequency range is not clear.
